name: Crowd Runner
description:
In this game you are controlling a bunch of people. They need to be saved from all kinds of obstacles surpassing their way. Use WASD or arrows to control the movement of crowd. Collect stars to unlock the power of splitting your people (via the Space button). This game was made for the Quarantine Game Jam in just 3 days. Theme of the jam was "A lot of". We decided to make game, when you can control "A lot of" people. Game was created in Godot Engine ver 3.2.

Music and most of the assets were created by us. 

Obstacles sprites are taken from the "superpixelobjectsanditems" pack.

Sounds (power up and dying) are from 8bitretrogamesfx pack.

We hope you'll like our game! We will be very grateful for any kind of feedback.
